description: Bridges: Method `getLocaleCollection()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `getLocaleCollection()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
